website_summaries.verdict: We love the Dean's deep charcoal gray appearance and versatility as a casual or dress watch. Great gift for men who appreciate a genuine Fossil watch at an entry-level price point.
pros: Suitable for formal and casual use
Very masculine design and unusual smoky stainless-steel finish
Oversized face and analog chronograph dials
cons: Date window is small and hard to read
Bracelet can be difficult to adjust

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Fossil Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Fossil watches for over a decade now and own about a dozen of them so I know the quality of the brand. This particular watch is stunning. I've never bought a gold toned watch but this one caught my eye and it is stunning in person. It doesn't look like faux gold and actually it is more of a color changer that looks silver-ish in certain light and then looks gold-ish in lower light. Definitely my new favorite watch !
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Even For a Woman
customer_reviews.text: I love Fossil watches. I have a Gen 3 Smartwatch and gifted my daughter with one as well. I use my Smartwatch for work (Mon-Fri) and I wanted an everyday watch. This style watch was also available at Macy's but at a more expensive price so I was extremely happy to find this watch on Amazon at a lesser cost. I did have to take the watch in to Fossil to remove some of the links to fit my wrist. (I'm a woman. I like the big face, men's watches.) Everything on the watch is functional and I've not had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RL.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the $...bought it for myself, even though I have a small wrist, I like the larger, chunkiness of Men’s watches...the larger watch face. So far it’s keeping perfect time, and I think looks great...I get a lot of positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: beckyb0416

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this watch when I gave it to him for his bday in 2016. However, within in few months one of the hands came loose. We sent it to Fossil and repair was done. BUT we have since had to send it for same issue two more times, had the crystal replaced twice, and now one of the little metal rings on one of the dials has come loose. Not bothering to send for repair again as I will have to pay for it. We’ve always loved Fossil brand but really disappointed in this watch.
customer_reviews.author: 006martint

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch. Gave it to my BF for V-day ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch. Gave it to my BF for V-day about 3 months ago he wears it everyday and has a very active job the watch shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rodland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed abut Water Resistance
customer_reviews.text: The inside of glass gets steamed only while you wash your hands I like Fossil watches but this one got me very disappointed The Description it says : Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch besides one minor problem..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend and was extremely satisfied when it came in! Looked exactly like pictures and seemed 100% authentic from the box it came in and the fact it was still in the plastic wrap inside the box. However when we went to go get it fitted to his arm the jeweler said it was already missing one of its links, thus the watch would be uneven on one side causing it to drift to one side. The jeweler was questioning where i bought it from which made me a bit embarrassed that i may have bought an unauthentic or repackaged watch. My boyfriend however didn't mind at all and still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Husband gets compliments still to this day. It is a very beautiful watch. Came with the medal fossil box, card, face protecter, and extra links. The watch is heavy. A legit fossil watch. My husband does get it cleaned every 6 months at Fossil. Also it does come with a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Resty

customer_reviews.title: Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: I would of put 5stars instead of 3 , but the directions came in a few languages but the only part in English was the warranty. So all I can do is set time and date. Theres 2 other buttons for 3 little circles , 1 is 60 seconds , one is a hour and one a full day. It looks great, came in the original box, I just only read English, not fluent in Spanish but I know it good enough but Spanish wasn't one of the languages in the booklet with the directions. The rarest Fossil store is 45 minutes drive, but my car was stolen and wrecked and I only had liability, no busses go that far.
customer_reviews.author: Sean j.

customer_reviews.title: When he saw the gold watch he fell on love with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my grandson. He was looking at the same model watch I'm the mall except silver with gold accents. When he saw the gold watch he fell on love with it. The gold isn't a deep gold so it doesn't look gaudy. Quality is good also. Would definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Crook

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a beautiful watch. I received it on time and it looks every bit as nice as I thought. Fossil makes great watches and this is definitely one of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive looking,  but budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: This watch is just as beautiful in person as it is on the screen! Maybe more. A great price for a great looking, dressier watch. You cannot go wrong w this watch. Dress it up or dress it down. You can wear it anywhere, any occasion!
customer_reviews.author: designergal1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made watch, very substantial and relatively heavy. I was a little concerned about the weight, but once it is on my wrist I don't even notice it's there. It has a stopwatch function, which I haven't had much need of so far. The hands are also luminescent, so I can check the time during the night. I did have to get the band adjusted. I watched some YouTube videos on how to do it, but in the end decided not to take chances and paid a jeweler $12 to remove some links. I love how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Werner

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my fiance. He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Very flashy watch for the price. My fiance bought this and he gets plenty of compliments. Easy to adjust the width for your wrist and sturdy. I believe if dropped it would keep its integrity and not break.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.  Minute hand came loose.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It looks great and it fits comfortably. But the minute hand came loose after a few months of having it. And just like my other Fossil watch, the battery died within about 10 months. Finding a place that can replace the battery is tough in my area, which adds to the frustration that I have to spend $10-15 more for the battery. When I used the warranty service to get the minute hand repaired, I was charged a standard service fee of $8. This also added to the negative experience of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Clean and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Watch came three days early, SWEEEEEET. Watch is actually better looking in person. No scratches on it at all. Has great weight to it, too. Not heavy or light. Very beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Overall watch looks really nice. If color doesn’t change soon valuable for price. What I didn’t like is delivery. I ordered two of them but received separate one came very late. What is worse delivery distance was only 25-30 mi. And took extra 3-4 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced at $140. Got it on sale for $80 and that’s still too high. I consider fossil a budget watch, but this is probably the best one they offer as far as being easy to read. The band is cheap and squeeks, but did not pull my hairs. At $140 your in Seiko, Citizen and Bulova prices that offer a better higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch for my husband for our wedding anniversary because I liked the style, and the big watch face. I ordered the watch in April (got it in 2 days with prime shipping), and it is now August and already broken. The second hand won't work. It's like it is unattached from whatever makes it work. What a waste of money because now we cannot return it. The return period expired in May. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Mandoff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but the packaging was messed up
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is really heavy and great quality. However it was intended to be a gift and the presentation box it came in was a little blue tin one and it was all dented so it made it look weird to gift. Plus the overall box quality looked a bit cheap but the actual watch is really nice
customer_reviews.author: C_M19

customer_reviews.title: Fossil makes beautiful watches, around $100.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this watch. It can be worn in any business setting. I've always wanted a Fossil watch, they're good quality for not a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch!!! Hands down one of the best looking I bought so far. The size is perfect and the color is beautiful I would highly recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Andy’sReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch, I thought it would leave some to be desired since it is slightly smaller than the Nate but it did not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Chr1099

customer_reviews.title: Minute hand broke after less than 2 weeks use.
customer_reviews.text: This had just been worn for regular life, not chopping wood, not playing hockey, nothing untoward, yet the second hand now circles the watch freely, pointing whichever way is down at the moment. Not only was this a birthday present, my husband had gone to a jeweler and paid to get the band sized correctly. So now we don't have a watch and we are out $20 extra. Only option was a refund, not a replacement. I am not sure whether to be angry or thankful about that. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch itself, but the leather band that it comes with quickly degraded and would stain my wrist after wearing it. I just went to the Fossil store and bought a new band with waterproof material lining the bottom with leather still on top, and voilà my problem was solved. This is a great watch for both casual and slightly formal situations.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty legit
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this watch. The only thing that I didn't like is nobody local would adjust the size for me
customer_reviews.author: Vader87

customer_reviews.title: THE HUBBY LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: This watch is actually really nice and chic, goes well with everything sport, casual, semi formal, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: My man Loved it! He was super excited when he saw ...
customer_reviews.text: My man Loved it! He was super excited when he saw it , definitely a great buy! Ladies i highly recommend if you are thinking of getting one for that special man in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Dean watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite satisfied with the watch's details and appearance. It was easy to setup. My only misgiving is there wasn't an instruction manual. I've gone online to view and download the instructions however the model number isn't included in the online manuals. I'll see as I go on, I believe I'll be alright without the manual.
customer_reviews.author: d glenn

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a gift for Father's Day to my dad. He loved it and he gets so many compliments on it! Every time I see him wearing it I agree it's one of the best purchases of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you’re 20
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice watch if you’re in you’re early 20’s or want to still look like you are.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eyolfson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and classy watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Fossil watches for years and this is what I expect from fossil
customer_reviews.author: Dubmaster

customer_reviews.title: This watch is impress
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of FOSSIL, and you are looking to upgrade your stylish looks. This is the watch for you it has a spectacular shine and golden look to it. I have not run in to any difficulties with this watch so far, other then the fact that I realized that time flies by a bit quicker then you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves the watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch was aChristmas gift for my husband. He really loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Herren

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Simple. stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I love it. I took it to my local fossil shop at the mall and they adjusted it for me. Dresses well with gold jewelry OR silver.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Lara

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Husband. He loves Fossil watches and this one really put a smile on his face. It looks really expensive and has a nice weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: jeyo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Really classy. Nice weight. It was a present for my boyfriend. Was really please with this purchase. I even engraved on the inside clip.
customer_reviews.author: Crisann R

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall love the watch look and design. Wish the leather band was more substantial as it's on the thin side.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Pasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Tic toc love
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend's husband and he was crazy about it
customer_reviews.author: ECBR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, compared it to a 1,200 dollar watch, and it feels just about the same quality-wise. I recommend this watch, it’s a killer deal for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Right on time
customer_reviews.text: I got a great price. I like my watch to have a little weight. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: We both love the large face of the watch The watch is ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it.He loves watches. I gave him this watch one month ago and he has not worn any of his other watches.. He even sleeps in it. We both love the large face of the watch The watch is beautiful and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MissTee

customer_reviews.title: it's one of his most favorite watches, and he wears it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a wedding gift to my husband, it's one of his most favorite watches, and he wears it all the time. The colors are great and it's a wonderful quality! He gets a lot of compliments on it when he wears it out!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: Product was used for intended it is a very classy good looking watch I just wish I had better access to different types of band since it’s got an easy quick band unlock system. Not to mention it came way ahead of time you guys are awesome considering everything that’s going on. Thank you for satisfy me with this
customer_reviews.author: carlos mato

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch...too bad the seller sold me a broken one
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is a nice looking watch. However, on it's delivery yesterday, I opened the package to set the watch to the correct time and date. While turning the crown to forward set the time, no issues. However, I over set the time and needed to roll back the minute hand to set it correctly. However when I turned the crown the opposite direction, the crown itself became dislodged from the watch. Next time I will buy from the store at the mall. Luckily, I had free return. I shipped the broken watch back today.
customer_reviews.author: KDog71

customer_reviews.title: 👌👍
customer_reviews.text: Good watch. Came on time with no problems. I've had it 8 months now, wear it everyday, and it is perfect. I've had fossils my whole life and they still make them just the same. Great craftsmanship. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Thank u very mush Product is very good. N In Usa
customer_reviews.text: Thank u very mush Product is very good . N In Usa , everybody do hard job , n who has no car , those people for amazon is very blessed, like me . Thank u AMAZON..
customer_reviews.author: YASH HAJARIWALA

customer_reviews.title: An exact duplicate of a beloved Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch to replace an exact duplicate which had been a Christmas Gift five years earlier. I had dropped the original, but had liked it so much and I was delighted to find out that it was still available. I'll be more careful with this one, but I'll still wear it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: John Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 14 year old son he loves it he get alot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking to buy this watch for a couple of years, however it almost never goes on sale at Fossil. Could not believe that I could get it for the price and it cam in two days! Perfect condition when received
customer_reviews.author: Bill Butler

customer_reviews.title: Fancy
customer_reviews.text: My friend got this for himself, love the two tone look
customer_reviews.author: jvan

customer_reviews.title: You can take your watch to any fossil store for sizing
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting this watch for 5 years and now That I have it! I love it! It’s even more stunning in person! Looks just like the picture! My package was on time! No complaints⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Jerell Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Fossils are fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for a birthday gift, which will be in 2 weeks I'll let you know Thanks
customer_reviews.author: patricia farley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and we both love it. It looks masculine and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Yania M. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: starjackson70

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy watch but after only 6 months the bezel ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy watch but after only 6 months the bezel came off. The first time it was found and the second it wasn't. The watch was sent back for repair on June 14th and still has not returned. Very unfortunate. Would not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch to add to your collection.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gold person, but I haven't been able to take my eye off this watch, and have been finding excuses to wear it. I like the gold tone and accents, not to flashy, but definitely eye catching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful watch! My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful watch! My husband loves it. The packaging of the item could of definitely been better. The case the watch was in was open and the watch moving around inside box. Could of easily scratched up the face of the watch. Other than that he's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Got it to gift. But the watch didn't live upto the expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Watch
customer_reviews.text: I received my watch today and I'm very pleased with the watch. Great quality and well designed. One problem was the instructions were missing on how to set and use the features but I figured it out. The watch fits great. I like Fossil watches and this is a great time piece.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy H

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, Grandson very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Came in a nice metal box too. Grandson was smiling all day!
customer_reviews.author: J Edens

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend as a birthday present and he LOVED it! It was beautiful, did not have a scratch on it, and a wonderful color. Very manly and he wears it with everything. The box the watch came in was pretty ugly, he actually thought it was a candy box... but he was very surprised whenever he opened it! He did not expect it at all and actually did not know it was even a fossil! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Grauel

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my boyfriend as a Christmas gift, he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: This watch is pretty nice! I love fossil watches and was happy that the watch fit without having to take a link out!
customer_reviews.author: MWLW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap look.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance nice. Then it looks too flashy and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK JAY

customer_reviews.title: Value worth money
customer_reviews.text: I liked this watch a lot. Found it cheap online rather then official website so bought it. Very good watch in a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: BHABISH SUBEDI

customer_reviews.title: Affordable style
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a gift for a Senior in HS. He wanted something he could wear to nice events but also casually. He loves the look and quality- it is a perfect mix of classic and sporty.
customer_reviews.author: KRD

customer_reviews.title: Classy watch
customer_reviews.text: Very classy time piece. Goes with everything. Dress up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected, the gold tone is just right. Absolutely beautiful I'm sure my boyfriend will love it....
customer_reviews.author: PP**

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Birthday gift for my son & he LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: I forgot my name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this watch and I can't wait to see my adult son's face when he opens this up! It is classy and can be worn with a suit or with casual attire. The leather is supple and beautiful with the face of the watch gorgeous. I would buy this again if I needed another man's watch!
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice looking watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Felt weighty and premium for under 100 bucks and the styling was pretty good. Gave it to my father for Father's Day and he liked it alot. Not waterproof though so be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Just too big of a watch
customer_reviews.text: Too BIG! I have a small wrist and this is just huge on my arm. I'm sending back and getting a Seiko that is smaller and has more features. This watch is ok, and the warranty is fantastic, but does not work for me. Anyone with a larger wrist would not go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! The charcoal grey is classic and sharp! Always a fan of Fossil products in general, but this one is a step up!
customer_reviews.author: tracivee17

customer_reviews.title: Being on time
customer_reviews.text: first appearance look more than what it cost good quality stay on time
customer_reviews.author: james perry AKA Deadshot

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Just received my watch and very impressed. It looks even better than it does in the pictures. Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: TeeShot

customer_reviews.title: Really happy.
customer_reviews.text: It is big and heavy but just right for my wrist. I had never heard of fossil before but needed a watch that was easy to read. This watch matched the requirements. It has more dials on it than I need and I'm not too sure what they do but that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Dano1988

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 18th birthday, he gets compliments whenever he wears it from both adults and peers. Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: jcan gyrl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6’7”, 230lbs and this watch was the perfect size for him. The face is big enough that it looks like a large watch but not too big that it look gody! He loves it and I think it looks great on him!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Warfe

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.. Everything is prefect along with shipping and package.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design, the dual tone look and quality of its finish. great watch for great price. Bought this for my Father-in-law and I am sure he would love it. Note: The dial of this watch is pretty large for a average wrist which is something you may want to think before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Navneet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend really loves his watch and he was able to size the watch on his own!
customer_reviews.author: Shamari ross

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: love this watch i got this last year, i wore it for my wedding got alot of compliments on it, i have been using it everyday i been swimming with it pool beach river you named no trouble with water, i also have been using when i was doing some construction work demolition mostly and didn't have dust trouble i think its the best $80 i have ever spend on a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sami K.

customer_reviews.title: What happen Fossil
customer_reviews.text: Owned this watch for a year and now the minute hand has come loose. Tried to go to the local Fossil store and it's closed. So, now I have to box it up, send it with a check and have it remotely repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch except the second hand stopped working within about ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch except the second hand stopped working within about 6 weeks - had to take it to the jeweler ;-\
customer_reviews.author: ppaddon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful, easy to adjust if you pop out the pins. Got this as a present for my boyfriend, he loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Seller was quick to resolve problem
customer_reviews.text: Had given a 1 star -seller was very quick at contacting me and helping with my issue . Thank you and husband loved the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Noice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Have total of 3( gold,two tone, and smoke) I love the face. Super classy.
customer_reviews.author: Tinop

customer_reviews.title: One year later...
customer_reviews.text: One year after purchase, one watch hand dangles loosely and one of the silver rings now knocks around inside the face. Will be sending to Fossil for repairs (hopefully covered by warranty).
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Bermingham

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and chic. Looks a little more expensive than it is and I've gotten some nice compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Adeife johnson

customer_reviews.title: This Fossil watch is a beautiful watch as well as durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This Fossil watch is a beautiful watch as well as durable and reliable. I bought it for my husband who doesn't normally wear a watch but he loves it. I have owned many Fossil watches and they all pass the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle I. Flint

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, garbage packaging/shipping
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine, came in a tin just as you expect from Fossil. I knocked stars off because it was shipped with the tin open in a plastic envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad's birthday, it was definitely a hit!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the watch is beautiful, but the 12 piece broke off within 3 months and needed to be repaired
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch less than 3 months ago and it’s already fading. Initially it looked and felt great but it had already started fading with me barely wearing the watch in this short period
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for his birthday and he LOVES it! It is a really classy color pair, with the brown and black, and he matches it with mostly everything!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very happy with his birthday present. Looks awesome. ( his wife wrote this review. It was his amazon account, but I bought it..lol)
customer_reviews.author: Wesley McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware this is not the original Dean
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this is not the original one. I have owned 2 of this exact same watch and this one is not the same as the others. Yes I still have the others, so I bought this and the moment I felt it my hands I knew something changed. This one feels cheaper and lighter than all of the others. Buyer beware, if you have owned one of these dean watches you will know they either cut corners on the band or are using a different viscosity of metal but it is 10000% not the same.
customer_reviews.author: The Chotskies Shop

customer_reviews.title: Good style
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch especially my wife and its really value for money
customer_reviews.author: Glag

customer_reviews.title: Truely Classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father's 50th. I hit it out the park with this one He loves it and it looks great on his hand. It fits a bit big but this watch is a classic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to receive this through Amazon. I originally selected and bought this watch from a local retail store, but then found it for $30 cheaper on Amazon. It arrived quickly and was very nicely packaged! The watch itself looked beautiful. As it was a gift, I cannot say anything else about the quality of it. My son seemed very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Nichols

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Dean Stainless Steel Chronograph Dress Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Keep pace in adventurous style with this handsome FOSSIL® watch.
 * Two-tone stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Textured dial features gold-tone hands and hour markers.
 * Dial ring features split-second track.
 * Water resistant 5 ATM/50 meters.
 * Imported.
